text:
WILLIAMS COLLEGE
WILLI AM STOWN, MASSACHUSETTS
)
OFFICE OF THE DEAN OF FRESHMEN
September 28, 1956
Mr. Harold E . Hill
Associate Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Hill:
President Baxter has turned over your letter of
July 17, 1956 to me for reply. Our new 10-watt FM transmitter
will not go on the air until November 1, and then for perhaps
a month on a test basis. Our current budget, which is devoted
primarily to construction, does not allow us sufficient funds to
join outside organizations,. Furthermore, detailed policies for
the operation of the Station are not yet complete.
Although we are interested in your fine organization,
we cannot consider application for membership at this time.
Sincerely,
Roy Lamson
Dean of F reshm en
